org.ow2.bonita.facade.internal
Interface RemoteBAMAPI

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
EJB2BAMAPI
public interface RemoteBAMAPI
extends java.rmi.Remote

This class provides a brief overview of Bonita Business Activity Monitoring.
Note: Using this API can affect engine performances.

Author:
Matthieu Chaffotte, Elias Ricken de Medeiros

Method Detail

getNumberOfOverdueSteps

int getNumberOfOverdueSteps(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Gets the total number of overdue steps (i.e. tasks) of every users. An overdue task is a task which its ended date is exceeded.

Parameters:
options - the options map (domain, queyList, user)
Returns:
he number of overdue steps.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getNumberOfStepsAtRisk

int getNumberOfStepsAtRisk(int remainingDays,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Gets the total number of steps at risk (i.e. tasks) of every users. A step at risk is a step which its ended date is close to exceed according to the remaining days.

Parameters:
remainingDays - the remaining days before the ended step date is exceeded.
options - the options map (domain, queyList, user)
Returns:
the number of steps at risk of every users.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
